items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful
items.body: Beautiful, soft, fits as sized, looks glamorous, I’m hoping the fabric washes well and wears well. Read more
items.author: Yvette Yonan

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Seems like a high-maintenance sweater; size way up
items.body: This sweater looks so cute in the listing, but the reality of it is a more than a little disappointing. First of all, the sizing. In order to get the look of the sweater on the model, you’d have to size WAY up. I’m guessing the model is wearing a size large or XL. The listing says, “Size recommendation: Please refer to size chart which we provide in our photos (The product measurement is clothes size, NOT body measurement).” However, at the time of this writing, there is no size chart ANYWHERE in the listing, and I don’t recall seeing one when I ordered, but if it was there, I followed it. I ordered the small, and it is more like a bolero sweater with how high it comes up my back. The sleeves are also too short. Second, the “pearls” are not in a neat lines as shown but are kind of jaggedly placed, and one was even missing—in a pretty conspicuous area—on the sweater I received. It was not loose in the packaging, so it must have been lost before it was packaged. I have no way to replace it (though I don’t know how I would attach it if I had it). Finally, I haven’t washed the sweater yet, but I don’t think I would even trust this sweater in a mesh laundry bag on gentle cycle in my machine. You’d have to hand wash it and lay it flat to dry, and that is too high maintenance for me. On the positive side, the sweater is soft, though my (much smaller) daughter didn’t want it because she felt it was scratchy. For reference, I’m 5’7”, 123#, 34C, and I ordered a size small. Read more
items.author: Julie E.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks & feels great
items.body: Initially I thought the quality was a little cheap, but proved to be a feel good and lays well on my body Read more
items.author: Carolyn D McCullough

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super soft...
items.body: This sweater is beautiful. I ordered a small based on the size chart but it does not have the oversized look as shown on the model. I am 5'2" 130 lbs, 28" waist. A medium would have been a more relaxed or oversized fit for me. However, I still like how soft and pretty this sweater looks. Definitely use a mesh laundry bag to prevent scratches on the pearl trim. Read more
items.author: Jean K

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Pure Black, Plain White, Solid Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
